MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Turkey Shore Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.29PM. Our engineers are on site investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.48PM on 20th January 2021.
